text.title: Category 1 Hurricane Nigel: National Hurricane Center's Thursday, Sep 21 status report
bodyParts: Article first published: Thursday, Sep. 21, 2023, 4 a.m. ET
Article last updated: Thursday, Sep. 21, 2023, 10 p.m. ET

As per the National Hurricane Center's 10 pm Thursday update, Category 1 Hurricane Nigel is 700 miles northwest of the Azores, with maximum sustained wind of 75 mph. Itâ€™s moving 37 mph to the east-northeast.
"Weakening is forecast during the next couple of days, and Nigel is forecast to become a post-tropical cyclone tonight or early Friday." forecasters explained.
Yesterday, Nigel lost momentum and regressed from a Category 2 hurricane to a Category 1 hurricane, with winds of 75 miles per hour.
